name: Fruit Am I⸮
description:
This is a game for Weekly Game Jam 249 and the subject is Mysterious Fruit. It was made in 6 days including game design, art and programming. We are inspired by Rusty Lake which is a well-known puzzle game. We made all this from scratch from the first day of game jam without pre-developed tools and discussions.

It’s recommended to turn on the sound.

*This game is available for mobile as well, but the game experience on pc&mac would be better.

We will upload our devlogs as soon as possible. :)

Credits: 

Hui-En Lin (Programmer) - https://hui-en.me / @hui_@hui_gamedev

ZY Wu (2D Artist)

Update
2022/4/22 14:58 UTC +8 - We failed to submit the game to Weekly Game Jam 249. We missed the deadline:( It was 9:00 UTC +8 in April 22th. We finished the game but forgot to submit it early.
